name: SMM Consultancy Services
goal:
SMM group is the product of more than twenty two (22) years experience that have originated from a small Legal Office in Malta to one that offers its services to International clients with its central base in Valletta

SMM Consultancy Services Limited (C C68458) forms part of SMM Group which also comprises SMM Advocates and SMM Fiduciary Services Limited which is still in the process of authorisation by MFSA

SMM Consultancy Services Limited and SMM Advocates, though separate and distinct entities within the group, operate in collaboration and assist whenever a certain particular area needs more specialised attention.

SMM Group professional service lines span a wide range of Dispute Resolution and Litigation, Corporate and Commercial, Banking and Financial Institutions, ICT, Investment and Management Funds, Private clients both local and International, Shipping and Super Yacht Registrations, Employment and Industrial Relations, Transport and International Trade, Tax, Mergers and Acquisitions, Real Estate and Construction, Projects and Logistics.

Our unique multi-disciplinary mix results in a greater learning experience for our members and superior all-encompassing results for our clients. The firm is well positioned to service clients ranging from high net worth individuals and families, owner-managed companies to larger corporations
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Customs, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Fisheries and Aquaculture, General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Presently the organisation is spear heading an innovative project concerning Aqua Culture based on semi submersible platforms that can be position far out at sea guaranteeing protection to the environment and a healthy food product whilst at the same time helping out in biodiversity
